## Wrangling and processing the data

Need to transform hourly data into daily data with aggregate and pipes.

```{r, Wrangle & Process Data}

#Import data
df <- read_xlsx("./Competition/Data/load.xlsx")

#Second way to wrangle data from hourly to daily
#use df_dailyV2 instead of df_daily
df_dailyV2 <- df %>%
  mutate( Date = ymd(date)) %>%
  select(3:26) %>%
  mutate(rowMeans(df_dailyV2)) %>%
  rename(Daily_data = "rowMeans(df_dailyV2)")

date <- df[,2]
df_dailyV2 <- cbind(date, df_dailyV2$Daily_data)

```
